```{r, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("gdata")
notas = read.xls("/Users/Larissa/Desktop/1S2019/ME_951/Provas/Notas.xls",header = TRUE)
notas = read.table("/Users/Larissa/Desktop/1S2019/ME_951/Provas/notas.txt",header = TRUE)
require(xtable)
kable(notas[,c(1,2,3,4,7,8,9)])
notasp1<-notas$P1
b<-rbind(summary(notasp1))
notasp2<-notas$P2
b1<-rbind(summary(notasp2))
notasp3<-notas$P3
b2<-rbind(summary(notasp3))
notasmf<-notas$MF
b3<-rbind(summary(notasmf))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=5, warning=FALSE}
par(mfrow=c(1,4))
# boxplot(notasp1,col="lightblue", type=3, ylim=c(0,10),main="P1")
# points(mean(notasp1,na.rm=TRUE))
# abline(h=6,lty=2)
boxplot(notasp1, horizontal=F,  outline=TRUE,col="rosybrown3", type=3, ylim=c(0,10),main="P1",cex.main=1)
points(mean(notasp1,na.rm=TRUE))
abline(h=6,lty=2)
boxplot(notasp2, horizontal=F,  outline=TRUE,col="rosybrown3", type=3, ylim=c(0,10),main="P2",cex.main=1)
points(mean(notasp2,na.rm=TRUE))
abline(h=6,lty=2)
boxplot(notasp3, horizontal=F,  outline=TRUE,col="rosybrown3", type=3, ylim=c(0,10),main="P3",cex.main=1)
points(mean(notasp3,na.rm=TRUE))
abline(h=6,lty=2)
boxplot(notasmf, horizontal=F,  outline=TRUE,col="rosybrown3", type=3, ylim=c(0,10),main="MF",cex.main=1)
points(mean(notasmf,na.rm=TRUE))
abline(h=5,lty=2)
```
